title: Ben Wallace – 2021 Comments on Future Soldier
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Ben Wallace, the Secretary of State for Defence, on 25 November 2021.
content:
Future Soldier is reinforced by the ambition outlined in the Defence Command Paper to transform the Army into a more agile, integrated, lethal, expeditionary force.
